entry.title: One Piece Roronoa Zoro Figure - 15cm Wano Country Arc Statue with Interchangeable Head
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 599.00

Unleash the "King of Hell" in your collection with this incredibly detailed 15cm figure of Roronoa Zoro from the Wano Country Arc! This dynamic statue captures Zoro in a powerful, relaxed pose, seated on a stylized box that adds to his formidable presence.
The figure showcases Zoro in his Wano attire, complete with his black clothes and a unique red pearl necklace. His signature swords are sheathed on his back, and he holds one in a contemplative stance. A standout feature of this collectible is the interchangeable head piece, allowing you to display Zoro with his classic green spiky hair and a confident, battle-ready grin. The sculpted purple and red effects on his arm and sword represent his powerful Haki and add a dynamic visual element.
Key Features:
* Iconic Wano Design: Faithfully recreates Zoro's look from the Wano Arc, including his attire and accessories.
* Interchangeable Head: Comes with an additional head piece, offering two distinct display options to capture different moments of the character.
* Intricate Sculpting: The figure is meticulously crafted, from the detailing on his muscles to the flowing effects on his sword.
* Dynamic Base: Zoro is seated on a beautifully sculpted box with the Straw Hat Pirates' Jolly Roger emblem, making for a unique and eye-catching display.
* Perfect Collector's Item: A must-have for any One Piece fan, celebrating one of the series' most beloved and powerful characters.
Bring the World's Greatest Swordsman to your home and showcase his strength and resolve. This Zoro figure is the perfect way to commemorate the epic events of Wano and a fantastic addition to any collection!

* Unconventional Gift: A perfect and humorous gift for any One Piece fan who loves Doflamingo's character or has a sense of humor.
Embrace the chaos with this one-of-a-kind Doflamingo chibi figure. It's a fantastic and unexpected addition to any One Piece collection, guaranteed to stand out with its unique charm and devilish grin.

Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 999.00

Unleash the power of the Sun God with this incredible 20cm figure of Monkey D. Luffy in his awe-inspiring Gear 5 form, complete with a unique LED light feature! This dynamic statue captures the explosive energy of Luffy's "Awakening," ready to dominate any collection.
The figure features Luffy in a powerful, grounded stance, with his signature billowing white hair and clothes sculpted to look like flowing clouds. His intense red eyes and confident smile are captured in stunning detail. This special edition also includes a striking LED light fixture that illuminates the scene, enhancing the magical and surreal presence of the "Drums of Liberation" and his Nika form.
Key Features:
* Epic Scale & Detail: Standing at a commanding 20cm, the figure is meticulously crafted to represent every aspect of Gear 5 Luffy.
* Integrated LED Light: The included LED light fixture adds a brilliant, luminous effect, making the figure a true centerpiece and perfect for display in any setting.
* Dynamic Pose: The figure is sculpted in a powerful combat stance, with incredible detail on the clothing and facial expression.
* Premium Quality: Made from high-quality PVC for durability and a premium, long-lasting finish.
* Exclusive Collector's Item: A must-have for any serious One Piece fan and collector, this illuminated figure truly brings the ultimate transformation of the Pirate King to life.
Bring the power and joy of the Sun God Nika to your home with this spectacular, one-of-a-kind Gear 5 Luffy figure with LED lighting. It's not just a statue—it's an experience!

entry.title: One Piece Monkey D. Luffy Figure - 20cm Wano Country Arc Statue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 899.00

Set sail for the New World with this stunning 20cm figure of Monkey D. Luffy from the Wano Country Arc! This dynamic statue captures Luffy in his iconic Wano outfit, exuding the determination and power of the future Pirate King.
The figure showcases Luffy in his red haori jacket, standing on a sculpted rock base. He holds his straw hat, a symbol of his promise to Shanks, while a translucent, sculpted flame and lightning effect swirl around him, representing his powerful Haki. The intricate details, from his battle-scarred chest to his intense gaze, bring this character to life.
Key Features:
* Authentic Wano Attire: Faithfully recreates Luffy's look from the Wano Arc, including his red jacket and billowing black cloak.
* Dynamic Pose: The figure is captured in a powerful and commanding stance, with sculpted effects that create a sense of action and energy.
* High-Quality Materials: Made from durable PVC for a detailed and long-lasting finish.
* Vibrant Effects: The translucent sculpted Haki flames and lightning add a visually striking element to the figure.
* Perfect Collector's Item: A must-have for any One Piece fan, celebrating one of the most pivotal arcs in the series and Luffy's journey.
Add the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates to your home and let his adventurous spirit inspire your collection. This Luffy figure is the perfect way to commemorate the epic battles of Wano and the indomitable will of the future Pirate King.

Relive one of the most epic battles from the Wano Country Arc with this meticulously crafted figure featuring Roronoa Zoro in a dynamic clash against the mighty Kaido, the King of the Beasts! This stunning collectible captures the intensity and power of their confrontation.

entry.title: One Piece Thousand Sunny Grand Ship Collection Model Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 1899.00

Set sail on an adventure with this detailed and easy-to-assemble model kit of the Thousand Sunny, the second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates from the epic anime and manga series, One Piece! This Grand Ship Collection model features pre-colored parts that snap together, eliminating the need for glue or paint. The kit perfectly captures the iconic design of the Thousand Sunny, including its lion-headed figurehead with the retractable propeller, the paddle-wheel propulsion system, and the various cannons.
This kit is perfect for fans of all ages and skill levels, whether you're a seasoned modeler or new to the hobby. The completed ship stands proudly on a display stand, making it a great addition to any collection or a fantastic desk ornament.
Note: This model kit comes with stickers for additional details and accents.
